pull_requests.title: BIP-XYZ: Standardized emoji based wordlist for future apps
pull_requests.body: ## Emoji Seed Word List Pull Request ## **Purpose** The purpose of this PR is to define and discuss the proper standardized definitions an official emoji seedlist. **Research** All research and discussions on the finalized standard are included in the **README** on **https://emojiseed.com**. **Community** The EmojiSeed community is just starting if you would like to join as a contributor or a watcher feel free to speak out. Learn more about the specification and community at: - https://emojiseed.com/ - https://emojiseed.com/discussions
